items.summary: Fix the prayer time calculation so that the displayed schedule matches real Indonesian prayer schedules for the selected timezone (WIB/WITA/WIT) and selected date, eliminating clearly incorrect outputs (e.g., Subuh appearing around 09:12 or Isya around 00:03 for WIB). Update the implementation in `frontend/src/utils/prayerTimes.ts` accordingly.

Ensure the Prayer Times UI reliably surfaces a user-visible error state (with a Retry action) when prayer time computation fails validation, and does not render an obviously-wrong schedule. Keep any newly introduced or modified user-facing text in the affected components in English.
